<title level="1" pfs="">[Arboreal Tar Tree](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1825)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Plant](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 31

**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 31

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 29

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 26
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 9">[Arboreal Tar Tree](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1825)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Plant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=125" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #177: Burning Tundra](/Sources.aspx?ID=116) pg. 31</row>

**Perception** +18; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Arboreal](/Languages.aspx?ID=26), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +20, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +18, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +15, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +18

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +3

**Con** +6

**Int** +2

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +4
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 28 

**Fort** +21 

**Ref** +15 

**Will** +18 

</row>

**HP** 175
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145)

**Resistances**
bludgeoning 10, piercing 10

**Weaknesses**
axe vulnerability, [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) 10

Axe Vulnerability An arboreal tar tree takes 10 additional damage from [axes](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=1).

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
thorny branch +19 ([reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d8+11 slashing plus [improved grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=27)

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
rock +19 ([Brutal](/Traits.aspx?ID=249), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 2d6+10 bludgeoning

**Primal Innate Spells** DC 25
- **2nd**
[Shape Wood](/Spells.aspx?ID=277) (at will)
- **3rd**
[Earthbind](/Spells.aspx?ID=94), [Slow](/Spells.aspx?ID=289), [Wall of Thorns](/Spells.aspx?ID=366)
- **5th**
[Black Tentacles](/Spells.aspx?ID=23), [Cloudkill](/Spells.aspx?ID=42), [Tree Stride](/Spells.aspx?ID=343) (only between dead trees)

**Spawn Tar Tree**  ([Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) A living [arboreal](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=8) or animated tree slain by a tar tree's thorny branch Strike rises as a tar tree spawn after 1d4 rounds. This tar tree spawn is under the command of the tar tree that killed it. It doesn't have primal innate spells or the spawn tar tree ability and becomes [clumsy 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) for as long as it's a tar tree spawn. If the creator of the tar tree spawn dies, the tar tree spawn becomes a full-fledged, autonomous tar tree; it regains its free will, gains primal innate spells and the spawn tar tree ability, and is no longer clumsy.

**[Throw Rock](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=38)** <actions string="Single Action" />  

</column>
name: Arboreal Tar Tree

This tar tree spawn is under the command of the tar tree that killed it. It doesn't have primal innate spells or the spawn tar tree ability and becomes clumsy 2 for as long as it's a tar tree spawn. If the creator of the tar tree spawn dies, the tar tree spawn becomes a full-fledged, autonomous tar tree; it regains its free will, gains primal innate spells and the spawn tar tree ability, and is no longer clumsy.
